DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Different Community Models ART Delivery Amongst Stable HIV+ Patients Two Urban Settings Zambia
DOC.detailed_description: The outcome study measure prospective cohort adult patient enrol ART care two urban community participate HPTN 071 ( PopART ) trial . The two community model : 1 ) adherence club , group 20-25 stable patient receive ART care community every 3 month , 2 ) home-based ART delivery community health worker delivers ART care individual home every 3 month . The standard care delivery ART care local clinic .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old On firstline ART retain care 6 month Virologically suppress World Health Organization ( WHO ) stage I II time screen Reside within clinic catchment area Willing provide write informed consent accept Community HIVcare Provider ( CHiPs ) intervention
